title: Weber on Fascism and Jacobinism in France

content.prompt: Which of the following would best explain the appeal of Fascism in France alluded to in the passage?

choices.label: The French alliance with Italy during the First World War
Political instability in France after the First World War
Lingering anti-Semitism in France in the aftermath of the Dreyfus affair
The incorporation of Alsace into France after the First World War

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
